attributes.background: make TFL free as there scammers.

rejection.details:
Transport in London is a matter for Transport for London, the Mayor of London and the Greater London Assembly. You can open a petition with the Greater London Authority here: https://www.london.gov.uk/who-we-are/what-london-assembly-does/petitions

Alternatively, we could accept a petition calling on the Government to provide funding to make all public transport (or just local public transport) free.
